bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Backplane Bus Specifications for Multiprocessor Architectures: Futurebus+(R)
IEEE Standard Backplane Bus Specifications for Multiprocessor Architectures: Futurebus+(R)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document provides a level of specification sufficient to design modules that are functionally, operationally, electrically, and mechanically compatible. Additional documents are necessary only to promote a higher degree of system level compatibility in manufacturersâ€™ products.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
